Entry.Name: Crypto Ecb Cipher
Entry.Description: By using block ciphers in ECB mode, the encrypted data can be easily read by a malicious actor even without knowing the decryption key.

Mitigation.Textual:
Use a different encryption mode such as CBC (Cipher Block Chaining) or GCM (Galois/Counter Mode) with a secure initialization vector (IV).
Further information at this links [1]
Mitigation.Suggested Steps:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Android Studio);
2. Search for the 'ECB' mode in the 'Cipher.getInstance()' method;
3. Replace all the vulnerable code with 'CBC' or 'GCM' mode instead of 'ECB';
4. For example from Cipher.getInstance('AES_128/ECB/PKCS5Padding') to Cipher.getInstance('AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding').
